com.redhat.rhn.common.validator

Class ParsedConstraint

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.redhat.rhn.common.validator.ParsedConstraint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Constraint
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RequiredIfConstraint

    public class ParsedConstraint
extends java.lang.Object
implements Constraint

    The Constraint class represents a single data constraint, including the data type, allowed values, and required ranges.

      • isPosix

        public boolean isPosix(java.lang.String s)
        Checks whether a string is a POSIX-compliant username - see http://www.opengroup.org/onlinepubs/009695399/basedefs/xbd_chap03.html#tag_03_276 for the definition
        Parameters:
        s - string to be checked
        Returns:
        true IFF all chars are a-zA-Z0-9._-, not beginning with -
